loyalty.loyalty.faq.a10: If you don't meet the requirements to maintain your current tier status, you will be adjusted to the next lower tier.
loyalty.loyalty.faq.a3: You can redeem your points for discounts, upgrades, and other rewards when you make a booking.
loyalty.loyalty.faq.a4: No, our loyalty program is completely free to join.
loyalty.loyalty.faq.a5: Tiers are automatically upgraded once you complete the required number of rentals within a calendar year.
loyalty.loyalty.faq.a6: Gold and Platinum members receive invitations to exclusive car launches, luxury partner events, and more.
loyalty.loyalty.faq.a7: No, loyalty points cannot be transferred from one account to another.
loyalty.loyalty.faq.a8: No, our loyalty program is completely free and starts with your first booking.
loyalty.loyalty.faq.a9: You can view your status and points balance by logging into your account on our website or contacting our customer service team.
